column4: i'm attempting to install ubuntu on a dell inspiron 6000, and i would like to install it so that windows is still restorable through dell's PC restore function. anyone point me to a guide or have any advice for me?
you may want to look into Wubi if you are rather new to Linux
i'm not that new to linux i just haven't dealt with dell's partition table before
I believe you can call technical support to request one
